clients.name: Name
clients.delete_all_caution:
Are you sure you want to remove all clients from the list?
The action doesn't prevent the client from reconnecting to the router, and all settings for those clients will also be removed.
clients.delete_caution:
Are you sure you want to remove the client from the list?
The action doesn't prevent the client from reconnecting to the router, and all settings for the client will also be removed.
clients.random_mac_tips: This is a randomized MAC address.
clients.random_mac_warning_tips: Your settings for the client may be invalidated due to changes in the device's MAC address.
clients.speed_tips:
This data represents the average speed of the last 3 minutes.
Note: The system begins calculating the average speed when this page is opened (Eg. If the page is opened for 10 seconds, the average speed will be based on only 10 seconds of data).
clients.clear_traffic_caution: Are you sure you want to remove all traffic statistics?
clients.hardware_acceleration_warning: $$$$Hardware Acceleration$$$$ is enabled, Client Speed and Traffic Statistics are abnormal, Client Speed Limit is not working.
clients.network_acceleration_warning: $$$$Network Acceleration$$$$ is enabled, Client Speed and Traffic Statistics are abnormal, Client Speed Limit is not working.
clients.access_control_tips: Access control allows or blocks access to your network for specific client devices.
clients.access_control_black_tips: A client device can't connect to the LAN and WAN if it is blocked.
clients.access_control_white_tips: A client device can only connect to the LAN and WAN if it is allowed access.
clients.import_mac_tips: You can import client device MAC addresses into the list. $$$$Download Import Template$$$$
clients.import_mac_add_tips: The successfully imported MAC addresses will be appended to the list.
clients.parse_mac_error_tips: Failed to resolve the MAC address, please check the file and re-upload it.
clients.parse_mac_success_tips: 1 valid MAC address have been resolved. | {count} valid MAC addresses have been resolved.
clients.parse_mac_warning_tips: 1 entry is not a valid MAC address it will be discarded if the import is confirmed. | {count} entries is not a valid MAC address it will be discarded if the import is confirmed.
clients.blacklist_self_error_tips: Disable adding the self MAC to the blocklist.
clients.whitelist_self_error_tips: The allowlist must contain the self MAC.
